keyMoments.title: Happygun Witnesses Akainu's Attack
keyMoments.description: Happygun watches in horror as Akainu punches through Jinbe to attack Luffy during the climax of the Marineford War.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this New World pirate at Marineford.

reveals.information: New World pirate present at Marineford

keyMoments.title: Luffy Receives His Chest Scar
keyMoments.description: Akainu's magma fist punches through Jinbe and severely burns Luffy's chest, creating the iconic X-shaped scar that Luffy will carry for the rest of the series.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy receives his permanent chest scar, one of the worst injuries he's ever suffered. This scar serves as a lasting reminder of Ace's death and the Marineford War.

reveals.information: Receives X-shaped chest scar from Akainu's magma attack

keyMoments.title: Jinbe Takes Akainu's Magma Punch
keyMoments.description: Jinbe is pierced through the chest by Akainu's magma fist while protecting Luffy. He nearly dies from this devastating injury but is saved by Crocodile's intervention and Law's medical treatment.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jinbe's complete dedication to protecting Luffy and honoring Ace's final wish. This near-death experience strengthens the bond between Jinbe and Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Jinbe Saved by Crocodile
keyMoments.description: Crocodile intervenes and launches Jinbe and Luffy to safety using his Sables technique, scolding Jinbe about proper protection.
keyMoments.significance: Jinbe is rescued by an unlikely ally, showing the complex alliances formed during Marineford.

reveals.information: Severely wounded by Akainu's magma punch through the chest

keyMoments.title: Akainu's Relentless Pursuit of Luffy
keyMoments.description: Akainu pursues Luffy with unwavering determination, stating he cannot let Dragon's son escape.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Akainu's ruthless commitment to absolute justice and his view of Luffy as a major threat.
keyMoments.quote: I cannot let the son of Dragon escape! He must die here!

keyMoments.title: Akainu Wounds Luffy and Jinbe
keyMoments.description: Akainu catches up and punches his magma fist through Jinbe's chest, severely burning Luffy and creating his permanent chest scar.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most devastating attacks in the series, leaving Luffy with a permanent reminder of this war.

keyMoments.title: Akainu Faces Whitebeard Commanders
keyMoments.description: Akainu is confronted by Marco, Vista, and other Whitebeard Division Commanders along with Crocodile, who block his path to Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the united front formed against Akainu to protect Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Saves Luffy from Akainu
keyMoments.description: Crocodile attacks Akainu with Desert Grande Espada and launches Luffy and Jinbe to safety with Sables, demonstrating an unexpected alliance.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Crocodile's complex character development as he saves his former enemy Luffy's life.
keyMoments.quote: If you want to protect someone, you have to do it right!

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Joins Whitebeard Commanders Against Akainu
keyMoments.description: Crocodile stands alongside Marco, Vista, and the Whitebeard Division Commanders to block Akainu's pursuit of Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Further cements the temporary alliance formed during Marineford.

abilities.description: Crocodile creates a large blade of sand that can slice through opponents, used to attack Akainu.
Crocodile creates a powerful sandstorm that can launch objects or people into the air.

name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law Arrives at Marineford to Save Luffy
keyMoments.description: Trafalgar Law dramatically arrives at Marineford in his submarine, announcing he is a doctor and offering to save Luffy's life.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Law's crucial role in saving Luffy and establishes the foundation for their future alliance.
keyMoments.quote: I'm a doctor. Bring Mister Strawhat over to me!

reveals.information: Law arrives at Marineford during the war's climax
Law identifies himself as a doctor capable of saving Luffy

name.japanese: 黒ひげ（マーシャル・D・ティーチ）

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Demonstrates Whitebeard's Earthquake Power
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard uses the stolen Gura Gura no Mi power to threaten to sink Marineford, demonstrating his new devastating abilities.
keyMoments.significance: First active use of Whitebeard's power by Blackbeard, showing his rise as a major threat.
keyMoments.quote: How should I begin using my new powers? I know - I'll sink Marineford to its core!

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard vs Sengoku
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard and his crew are blasted by Sengoku's Buddha form shockwave while attempting to destroy Marineford.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that despite his new power, Blackbeard still faces formidable opposition from the Marines.

keyMoments.title: Sengoku Attacks Blackbeard Pirates
keyMoments.description: Sengoku transforms into Buddha form and delivers a powerful shockwave to the Blackbeard Pirates, then rallies the Marines with a speech.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sengoku's leadership and power as Fleet Admiral, maintaining Marine morale despite heavy losses.
keyMoments.quote: Do not let them escape! We will not allow evil to triumph here!

keyMoments.title: Koby Questions Marine Justice
keyMoments.description: Koby becomes confused about the Marines' concept of justice as he witnesses continued killing after the war is won, experiencing Haki visions.
keyMoments.significance: Beginning of Koby's Observation Haki awakening and his moral development, setting up his crucial action in the next episode.

keyMoments.title: Marco Leads Whitebeard Commanders to Protect Luffy
keyMoments.description: Marco and the other Whitebeard Division Commanders stand before Akainu to protect Luffy's escape.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Whitebeard Pirates honoring their captain's and Ace's wishes by protecting Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Vista Defends Luffy from Akainu
keyMoments.description: Vista stands with the other Whitebeard Commanders against Akainu, declaring that Luffy is the one Ace loved and Whitebeard recognized.
keyMoments.significance: Expresses the Whitebeard Pirates' respect for Luffy and their commitment to protecting him.
keyMoments.quote: Strawhat Luffy is the one Ace loved and Whitebeard recognized. We won't let you have him!

keyMoments.title: Buggy Accidentally Catches Luffy and Jinbe
keyMoments.description: Buggy accidentally catches the airborne Luffy and Jinbe, with his followers praising him as a hero while he's terrified.
keyMoments.significance: Continues Buggy's running gag of accidentally becoming a hero and gaining fame through misunderstood cowardice.

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Ivankov Fights Akainu
keyMoments.description: Ivankov intervenes to protect Luffy and Jinbe from Akainu, engaging him in combat.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Revolutionary Army's commitment to protecting Dragon's son.
